source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is a scenery shot of a Venetian canal, captured from a high-angle perspective. The scene opens with an extreme wide shot where historic buildings line the top, left, and right sides of the frame, situated in the middle ground and background. The canal itself occupies the bottom and center, extending from the foreground into the middle ground. A white water bus travels in the middle ground, slightly right of center, while various gondolas are positioned throughout: one is in the foreground at the bottom left, another is in the middle ground to the left, and several are docked along the left bank. The camera then slowly zooms in, reframing the scene into a wide shot that brings the buildings and boat activity in the middle ground into a tighter, more focused composition.
